languages.text: The psyker gains +{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and half this amount as additional armour against {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} from las, melta, and plasma weapons.
languages.original_text: Псайкер получает +{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb}% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} дополнительно против огненного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} и половину этой прибавки к броне против {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}энергетического урона{/g} от лазерного, плазменного и мельта-оружия.

traits.locale_text: The Psyker gains +<u>10×(psy rating)</u>% additional armour against fire damage and half this amount additional armour against energy damage from las, melta and plasma weapons.
The psyker gains +<u>(10 × psy rating)</u>% additional armour against fire damage and half this amount as additional armour against energy damage from las, melta, and plasma weapons.

The psyker gains +{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and half this amount as additional armour against {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} from las, melta, and plasma weapons.

The psyker gains +{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} and half this amount as additional armour against {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} from las, melta, and plasma weapons.

The psyker gains +{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and half this amount as additional armour against {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} from las, melta, and plasma weapons.

languages.text: Псайкер получает +{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb}% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} дополнительно против огненного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} и половину этой прибавки к броне против {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}энергетического урона{/g} от лазерного, плазменного и мельта-оружия.
languages.original_text: The psyker gains +{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and half this amount as additional armour against {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} from las, melta, and plasma weapons.

traits.locale_text: Псайкер получает +<u>(10 × пси-рейтинг)</u>% к дополнительной броне против огненного урона и половину этой прибавки к броне против энергетического урона от лазерного, плазменного и мельта-оружия.
Псайкер получает +<u>(10 × пси-рейтинг)</u>% к дополнительной броне против огненного урона и половину этой прибавки к броне против энергетического урона от лазерного, плазменного и мельта-оружия.

Псайкер получает +{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb}% к дополнительной броне против огненного урона и половину этой прибавки к броне против энергетического урона от лазерного, плазменного и мельта-оружия.

languages.text: 当灵能者受到火焰{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，可获得{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb}%的额外{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}来抵抗这次伤害。当受到激光武器、热熔武器或等离子武器攻击，受到{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}能量伤害{/g}时，获得的额外护甲为此数值的一半。
languages.original_text: The psyker gains +{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and half this amount as additional armour against {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} from las, melta, and plasma weapons.

traits.locale_text: 当灵能者受到火焰{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，可获得{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb}%的额外{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}来抵抗这次伤害。当受到激光武器、热熔武器或等离子武器攻击，受到{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}能量伤害{/g}时，获得的额外护甲为此数值的一半。
当灵能者受到火焰伤害时，可获得{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb}%的额外{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}来抵抗这次伤害。当受到激光武器、热熔武器或等离子武器攻击时，获得的额外护甲为此数值的一半。

languages.text: El psíquico gana un +{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} adicional contra el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} por fuego, y la mitad de esta cantidad como armadura adicional contra el {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}daño por energía{/g} causado por armas láser, de fusión y de plasma.
languages.original_text: The psyker gains +{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and half this amount as additional armour against {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} from las, melta, and plasma weapons.

traits.locale_text: El psíquico gana un +{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} adicional contra el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} por fuego, y la mitad de esta cantidad como armadura adicional contra el {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}daño por energía{/g} causado por armas láser, de fusión y de plasma.

El psíquico gana un +{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} adicional contra el daño por fuego, y la mitad de esta cantidad como armadura adicional contra el daño por energía causado por armas láser, de fusión y de plasma.

languages.text: Der Psioniker erhält +{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb} % zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} gegen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Feuerschaden{/g} und die Hälfte dieses Betrags als zusätzliche Rüstung gegen {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energieschaden{/g} durch Laser-, Melter- und Plasmawaffen.
languages.original_text: The psyker gains +{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and half this amount as additional armour against {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} from las, melta, and plasma weapons.

traits.locale_text: Der Psioniker erhält +{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb} % zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} gegen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Feuerschaden{/g} und die Hälfte dieses Betrags als zusätzliche Rüstung gegen {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energieschaden{/g} durch Laser-, Melter- und Plasmawaffen.

Der Psioniker erhält +{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb}% zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} gegen Feuerschaden und die Hälfte dieses Betrags als zusätzliche Rüstung gegen Energieschaden durch Laser-, Melter- und Plasmawaffen.

languages.text: Le psyker bénéficie de +{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} supplémentaire contre les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de feu, et la moitié de cette valeur comme armure supplémentaire contre les {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}dégâts d'énergie{/g} des armes à laser, à fusion et à plasma.
languages.original_text: The psyker gains +{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and half this amount as additional armour against {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} from las, melta, and plasma weapons.

traits.locale_text: Le psyker bénéficie de +<u>(10 × indice psy)</u> % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} supplémentaire contre les dégâts de feu, et la moitié de cette valeur comme armure supplémentaire contre les dégâts d'énergie des armes à laser, à fusion et à plasma.

Le psyker bénéficie de +{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} supplémentaire contre les dégâts de feu, et la moitié de cette valeur comme armure supplémentaire contre les dégâts d'énergie des armes à laser, à fusion et à plasma.

languages.text: 異能者は炎{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に対して+{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb}%の追加{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を得て、レーザー、メルタ、プラズマ武器による{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}エネルギーダメージ{/g}に対してこの半分の追加アーマーを得る。
languages.original_text: The psyker gains +{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and half this amount as additional armour against {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} from las, melta, and plasma weapons.

traits.locale_text: 異能者は炎{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に対して+{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb}%の追加{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を得て、レーザー、メルタ、プラズマ武器による{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}エネルギーダメージ{/g}に対してこの半分の追加アーマーを得る。
異能者は炎ダメージに対して{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb}%の追加{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を得て、ラス、メルタ、プラズマ武器によるエネルギーダメージに対してこの半分の追加アーマーを得る。

languages.text: Ruhsezer, ateş {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarına{/g} karşı +%{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb} ilave {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} kazanır. Ayrıca bu miktarın yarısı kadar da lazer, melta ve plazma silahlarının verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}enerji hasarına{/g} karşı ilave zırh elde eder.
languages.original_text: The psyker gains +{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and half this amount as additional armour against {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} from las, melta, and plasma weapons.
